DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect intensive 4 week exercise train program without additional treatment antioxidant . 16 volunteer include study randomize treatment ( n=8 , Vitamine E 400 IU od + vitamine C 1g twice daily ) non-treatment ( n=8 , train ) group . Before train program , skeletal muscle biopsy take measure PGC-1alpha PPARgamma mRNA expression . In addition training program individual follow measurement : body weight , waist circumference , body fat content ( DEXA scan ) , euglycemic-hyperinsulinemic clamp , ergospirometer ( VO2 max ) , routine laboratory measurement , serum malondialdehyde concentration .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Biomarkers Response Training Antioxidant Treatment
DOC.criteria: Must able swallow tablet sign informed consent concommitant medication male age 25 35 year drug , tobacco alcohol abuse chronic disease acute chronic inflammatory disease determine leucocyte count > 7000 Gpt/l , Creactive protein ( CrP ) > 5.0 mg/dl clinical sign infection systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > 140mmHg diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 85mmHg cardiovascular peripheral artery disease thyroid dysfunction
